name: Path of the Totem Warrior
description: Totem Warriors draw on animal spirits for guidance and power, gaining abilities that reflect the traits of powerful beasts.

3.name: Spirit Seeker
3.description: You can cast beast sense and speak with animals as rituals.

3.name: Totem Spirit
3.description: You gain a totem spirit that grants you benefits while raging.

options.name: Bear
options.description: While raging, you have resistance to all damage except psychic.

options.name: Eagle
options.description: While raging, enemies have disadvantage on opportunity attacks against you, and you can Dash as a bonus action.

options.name: Wolf
options.description: While raging, your allies have advantage on melee attack rolls against creatures within 5 feet of you.

6.name: Aspect of the Beast
6.description: You gain a magical benefit based on your chosen animal aspect.

options.name: Bear
options.description: You gain double carrying capacity and advantage on Strength checks to push, pull, lift, or break objects.

options.name: Eagle
options.description: You can see up to 1 mile away with no difficulty and have advantage on Perception checks relying on sight.

options.name: Wolf
options.description: You can track creatures while traveling at a fast pace and move stealthily at a normal pace.

10.name: Spirit Walker
10.description: You can cast commune with nature as a ritual.

14.name: Totemic Attunement
14.description: You gain a powerful feature based on your chosen totem spirit.

options.name: Bear
options.description: Creatures within 5 feet of you have disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than you.

options.name: Eagle
options.description: You can fly up to your movement speed while raging.

options.name: Wolf
options.description: You can knock a Large or smaller creature prone when you hit it with a melee attack.
